nodes.text: The Salin system was home to the planet Salin. It was located in the Outer Rim's Sprizen sector. The system was the start point of two large hyperspace trade routes in the Outer Rim Territories: the Veragi Trade Route and the Salin Corridor named after the system were it originates.

The system and most prominetly its main planet Salin was part of the Kwa holdings during the Pre-Republic era. With the ascendancy of the Rakatan Infinite Empire, the Salin system was annexed and the Kwa species were annihilated and driven back to Dathomir space.
